description.title: This is the app description
description.value: Create and link a ticket from an existing one

label.title: This is the field that will contain the linked ticket data, like the ID etc...

helpText.title: This is the helptext of the reference field so the user knows what to enter. this appears on the settings page of an app
helpText.value: Place a custom text field ID here to store the Linked Ticket reference data. Example : 2240041

label.title: this is the tag that the admin wishes to apply to every ticket that has gone through the app. this is to be defined on the settings page

helpText.title: this is the help text for the child tag field
helpText.value: This tag will be added to the created child ticket. Example : child_ticket

ajax_failure.title: standard error message
ajax_failure.value: An error occurred. Please try reloading the app.

ancestry_field_missing.title: standard error message trying to help the user troubleshoot
ancestry_field_missing.value: Linked Ticket App: Did you follow the set up instructions and set up a custom field?

has_parent.title: this is displayed on the right hand side of a ticket once the ticket has been broken into two. it's to inform the agent that this ticket has a parent ticket which is a linked ticket basically
has_parent.value: This ticket has a parent ticket.

has_child.title: this is displayed on the right hand side of a ticket once the ticket has been broken into two. it's to inform the agent that this ticket has a child ticket which is a linked ticket basically
has_child.value: This ticket has a child ticket.

label.title: This is a form to create a linked ticket from an existing regular ticket, this is the subject of the future child ticket
This is a form to create a linked ticket from an existing regular ticket, this is the description of the future child ticket
This is a form to create a linked ticket from an existing regular ticket, this is the requester email of the future child ticket
This is a form to create a linked ticket from an existing regular ticket, this is the requester name of the future child ticket
This is a form to create a linked ticket from an existing regular ticket, this is the assignee group of the future child ticket
This is a form to create a linked ticket from an existing regular ticket, this is the label for the requester from of the app

current_user.title: This is a value from the requester dropdown, a bunch of options, one of them being making yourself as the requester

ticket_requester.title: This is a value from the requester dropdown, a bunch of options, one of them being making the original ticker requester the new requester too

custom.title: This is a value from the requester dropdown, a bunch of options, one of them being creating a new requester

label.title: This is a form to create a linked ticket from an existing regular ticket, this is the label for the assignee from of the app

current_user.title: This is a value from the requester dropdown, a bunch of options, one of them being making yourself as the assignee

ticket_assignee.title: This is a value from the requester dropdown, a bunch of options, one of them being making the current ticket assignee the new assignee

custom.title: This is a value from the requester dropdown, a bunch of options, one of them being creating a new assignee

group_label.title: This is a form to create a linked ticket from an existing regular ticket, this is the label for the assignee group from of the app

name_label.title: This is a form to create a linked ticket from an existing regular ticket, this is the label for the assignee name from of the app

label.title: This is a checkbox option to copy the current ticket description into the future ticket created through the app
this is a field containing CCs on this ticket
this is a field containing tags on this ticket

submit.title: this is a big button to submit the ticket creation form

loading.title: wait text while ticket is being submitted

id.title: in the app once the ticket is created this is a form proving them with information on the other ticket child/parent real time state. this is for the ID of the other ticket

subject.title: in the app once the ticket is created this is a form proving them with information on the other ticket child/parent real time state. this is for the subject of the other ticket

status.title: in the app once the ticket is created this is a form proving them with information on the other ticket child/parent real time state. this is for the status of the other ticket

type.title: in the app once the ticket is created this is a form proving them with information on the other ticket child/parent real time state. this is for the type of the other ticket

assignee.title: in the app once the ticket is created this is a form proving them with information on the other ticket child/parent real time state. this is for the assignee of the other ticket

group.title: in the app once the ticket is created this is a form proving them with information on the other ticket child/parent real time state. this is for the group of the other ticket

problem.title: when the ticket type is about a problem

incident.title: when the ticket type is about an incident

question.title: when the ticket type is about an question

task.title: when the ticket type is about a task

delimiter.title: This is a placeholder text marking the different between the new text and the old one
